resources.string: • Android demo app that searches for users against the GitHub v4 GraphQL API\n• Uses the Apollo-Android client to make requests in the default branch\n• Transmits JSON queries over HTTP with Volley in an alternate branch

• Android app for issue tracking that integrates with the GitHub issues API
• Built with Kotlin and follows the Model-View-ViewModel architectural pattern
• Uses Lottie for animations, Koin for injecting dependencies, and Retrofit for making API requests
• Also utilizes Kotlin Coroutines for asynchronous tasks

• Android app that assists users in locating their items following a residential move
• Built with a mix of Java and Kotlin
• Follows the Model-View-ViewModel architectural pattern
• Uses Dagger2 for injecting dependencies, Room for local storage, Glide for image loading, and CameraX for a custom viewfinder
• Also utilizes Kotlin Coroutines for asynchronous tasks
• Independently screened and enrolled patients, obtained written consent, and conducted multi-variable surveys investigating quality of care delivered by the patients\' assigned general medicine team
• Enrolled patients for study and conducted follow-up interviews by telephone
• Marketed a line of popular kitchen cutlery known as Cutco\n• Personally responsible for just over $10,000 in sales\n• Recruited into the branch manager training program
